sect1.title: Credits
sect1.para: Many people have contributed both directly and indirectly to BLFS. This page lists all of those we can think of. We may well have left people out and if you feel this is the case, drop us a line. Many thanks to all of the LFS community for their assistance with this project. If you are in the list and wish to have your email address included, again please drop us a line to &maintainer-address; and we'll be happy to add it. We don't include email addresses by default so if you want it included, please state so when you contact us.
